channel.title: Need help with voule auto restarter and more
channel.description: look when i load voule auto restarter it goed gone in faster than 1 sec so i need help witht his part how do i do that it goes good (it was good before but then moparscape was triping restarted computer and it was that again) and when i log in on my net there is loading please wait in begin but it wont come further

item.title: Need help with voule auto restarter and more
item.dc:creator: @b0sman b0sman
item.description:
@b0sman wrote:

but are you sure its nothing to java? cause runserver isnt working to… i only have downloaded java do i need to do anything else?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with voule auto restarter and more
item.dc:creator: @masterp00n masterp00n
item.description:
@masterp00n wrote:

delete all voule thing in your folder and then download again from rune-server and then put all the voule’s in your folder and then when your running your server double click the voule.bat and it will restart automatically

Read full topic
